text: Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 17. I will not go swinging my arms in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๑๗. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่ไกวแขนไปในละแวกบ้าน”
17. I shall not go fidgetting (swinging) the arms in inhabited areas: this is a training to he done.
